short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Browser extension show and tag address/contract cross-chain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hoverscan allows you to select any EVM compatible address on a webpage and view a popup with balance, transactions, and other details for that address across different blockchains. No need to switch sites or open new tabs, quickly check address info with ease.
